pjv.evolution.genetic

Class AbstractPopulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • pjv.evolution.genetic.AbstractPopulation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Population

    public class AbstractPopulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Population of individuals used by the evolutionary algorithm.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double avgFitness
      Average fitness in the population.
      protected AbstractIndividual[] individuals
      Array of all the individuals in the population.

      • getAvgFitness

        public double getAvgFitness()
        Computes an average fitness of all the individuals in the population, using their getFitness method.
        Returns:
        average fitness in the population

      • getBestIndividual

        public AbstractIndividual getBestIndividual()
        Returns the best individual (the elite) currently present in the population, based of the values returned by the getFitness method.
        Returns:
        The elite individual

      • getVertexCover

        public Pair getVertexCover(AbstractIndividual individual)
        Returns a pair of two integers. The first one is a number of nodes that are activated and the second one is a number of how many edges are not covered.
        Parameters:
        individual - Usually the best individual in a population
        Returns:
        pair of two integers

      • sortByFitness

        public void sortByFitness()
        Internally sorts the individuals in the population according to their fitness values
